outputs.output_descr: Strengthening regional groupings;  Mainstreaming cross-cutting development concerns in parliamentary activities ; Research and advocacy on increasing Parliamentary representation for Women
Technical assistance, research and Capacity building of governments and civil society to support legislative compliance with Human rights treaties.
Technical backstopping in design, implementation and monitoring of national decentralization and local governance initiatives

Human rights and HRBA training and capacity building of media in the PacificTechnical advice, capacity building and advocacy to governments, parliaments and civil society in support of Freedom of Information laws and disclosure policies

- Advocacy and Capacity Devpt for the Ratification and Implementation of the UN Convention Against Corruption  and OECD-ADB Anti-corruption framework Support  Implementation of a Regional Mechanism for Ombudsman functions

project_descr: Building resilient Pacific communities by developing their capacity for good governance through strengthening parliaments and representative institutions; accountability and anti-corruption; local governance; civil society and human rights.
